extendedInfo.description: Period Tracker, the easiest way to track your periods is now on Android! * Press a button at the start of your period every month. Period Tracker logs your dates and calculates the average of your past 3 months' menstrual cycles to predict the start date of your next period. * View your current and future period dates, ovulation and fertile days, your moods and your symptoms in a simple month-view calendar. * Decorate your phone with an icon that looks great on your home screen and that's discreet. It reads simply "P Tracker." Period Tracker is FILLED WITH FEATURES. * Take daily notes of moods, symptoms, and intimacy. * Easily view the number of days until next period or number of days late. * Know when you're fertile with flowers that show on your homescreen during your predicted ovulation and eight day "fertile window." Period Tracker has been raved about by thousands of users. MommaRed - "I really like this application. It is easy to use, easy to track and plan for upcoming events. The recent updates have made it even better. One of my favorite apps." Blanczz226 - "This is one of my favorite apps. I use it every month and it's extremely accurate. Worth the $ for sure" GeekSugar.com - "Period Tracker is the ultimate menstrual mentor. You enter in your info, and it tracks your cycles, letting you keep notes about your activities and well being, all the while using twee 'lil hearts and flowers to denote important days." Celstemc - "One of my first apps and I am completely in love with it! Won't use another one like it!! Cute and easy to use!" Please email comments and suggestions to supportgpa@gmail.com.Disclaimer: Period Tracker period and fertility forecasts may not be accurate and should not be used to prevent unwanted pregnancy.  To forecast ovulation Period Tracker calculates 14 days before the projected start date of one's next period.  Forecast accuracy depends on a number of factors including how regular one's cycle length is, when one actually ovulates during the cycle, and how many periods have been logged in the app.  Anxiety, stress, diet, nutrition, exercise, environment, medications, age and other factors can also affect one's cycle from month to month.  By downloading this app you agree to the End User License Agreement at http://gpapps.com/support/eula/ .

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s very convenient and very stylish. So many different things that I can use. Love it!
reviews.author: Dorina Rios

reviews.title: Love this app..... but
reviews.comment: Why on home screen it doesn\'t say end period anymore? Why is it telling me how many fays I have left before it starys again but it has not even ended yet? Before it showed the amount of days currently going until yiu select period ended then it shiws how many days left. Please change back to that original way. It made it very easy. I love this app
reviews.author: Jordi Thomas

reviews.comment: Good app.. Couple of times my back up synced a few days off, but it\'s improved in the update..
reviews.author: CJ Thompson

reviews.title: Very helpful in tracking!
reviews.comment: Helps me keep track of my cycles and how im feeling which is important for my doctors appointments
reviews.author: Candice DeLuna

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Just getting started but so far, so good.
reviews.author: Niki Smith

reviews.title: Good so far
reviews.comment: I does what it says. I have to give it a little more time to comment on its accuracy

reviews.title: Great, but needs some bugs fixed
reviews.comment: I love this app so much. It\'s nice and convenient. But at the moment it needs a bug fixed. The app said I\'m going to have 3 periods a month. Every month. Great app, needs to be fixed
reviews.author: Veronica Cogan

reviews.comment: Its great ,especially if you cant keep up with your P. But its off at times with your next expected P date
reviews.author: Del Spence

reviews.title: Very good but.....
reviews.comment: It needs to show what day of your cycle you are on, on the opening page. Right now you have to look everywhere to find out. The day of your cycle needs to be on opening page just like Menstrual Calender then this app would be perfect.
reviews.author: Colleen Hoffman

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: This is my first time use it love the setup. i just a range everything to suit me my period don\'t comes every 28day but five day befor the last date .
reviews.author: Amril Joseph

reviews.title: Love it!!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Its so easy to use and it fixes its problems fast! I would be in a panic if I ever lost this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love d app!
reviews.comment: been usin ot for over a year now.only flaw is dis app doesnt giv a chart of temperature n weight fluctuations/trend. pls add dis feature n ill giv 5 stars. again,love dis app.
reviews.author: Ribecca T. Domingo

reviews.title: Trying to avoid pregnancy
reviews.comment: I love the accuracy.
reviews.author: Hillary Misselbrook

reviews.title: Yep
reviews.comment: Like that you can track your symptoms. But have been using for 3 months and never start on the right date..
reviews.author: Tiffany Schiavone

reviews.title: Best Female App EVER
reviews.comment: Love this app....
reviews.author: Danielle Williams

reviews.title: KennethWife
reviews.comment: I found that the information is accurate and easy to work I love it if you don\'t keep up with your cycle this is an easy way to keep track and you can keep up with each time your intimate
reviews.author: Keshawn Lewis

reviews.title: Fabulous!
reviews.comment: This application stirs up excitement for my period. I love love love all the features and easy use. Very clean interface and user-friendly.
reviews.author: Ashley Lowe

reviews.title: Best app for us!
reviews.comment: After using multiple apps this app has played an important role in helping us track monthly cycles.   Being able to also track moods, temp, weight, add notes, and other vital information also allows my physician better care for me.   I love the password security it offers, as well as being able to back up all saved information to my email regularly.  Should anything happen to the phone, i know that not all is lost...just the phone...lol!   To the creator of this app.tysm for helping make tracking easier!
reviews.author: Danielle S

reviews.title: 3 years!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for 3 years now and it has never let me down! I have such an accurate estimated start date each period that I completely trust the app and nothing else! Love the idea of adding notes, symptoms and moods for each day of your period or even after/before. I never give reviews but this app is a life saver and I love it so much!  Recommended immensely. This is THE best period tracker app out there. Plus it\'s easy to navigate!
reviews.author: Shannon Murray

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is great n easy to use :) also private and it doesn\'t freeze up like the others.
reviews.author: Samantha Floyd
